de.wwu.muggl.vm.initialization
Class ThrowableGenerator

java.lang.Object
  de.wwu.muggl.vm.initialization.ThrowableGenerator

public class ThrowableGenerator
extends java.lang.Object

This classes provides method to generate instances of type Throwable thrown during the execution of instructions. It is especially meant to be used to generate the runtime exceptions and errors specified by the Java virtual machine specification. This, of course, could be done at the point an actual exception is thrown at. As the generation takes up some code, it is wrapped here.

Version:
1.0.0, 2009-03-31
Author:
Tim Majchrzak

Constructor Detail

ThrowableGenerator

public ThrowableGenerator(VirtualMachine vm)
                   throws InitializationException
Construct an instance of the throwable generator. Not more than one generator is needed per virtual machine instance.stringObjectref

Parameters:
vm - The virtual machine this generator belongs to.
Throws:
InitializationException - If loading class java.lang.Throwable fails.
java.lang.NullPointerException - If parameter vm is null.
Method Detail

getException

public Objectref getException(java.lang.String typeString)
Get an instance of a java.lang.Throwable sub type as specified. It will only be initialized statically, but no instance fields will be set. This equates to using the empty constructor Throwable.Throwable().

Parameters:
typeString - The fully qualified class name of the Throwable object reference to generate.
Returns:
The generated object reference.

getException

public Objectref getException(java.lang.String typeString,
                              java.lang.String message)
Get an instance of a java.lang.Throwable sub type as specified. It will only be initialized statically and have the field detailMessage set to the specified value. This equates to using the constructor Throwable.Throwable(String).

Parameters:
typeString - The type of the exception to create. The fully qualified class name of the Throwable object reference to generate.
message - The detail message of the exception. The detail message of the Throwable.
Returns:
The generated object reference.
